name: Bad Force
description:
This game was made for the libGDX Jam of September 2021 with the theme of Zero Gravity. It is an unholy marriage of Bad North, Left 4 Dead 2, and StarCraft.

Use left click to select units (or use keys 1-4). Right click to make a move order. You can zoom in and out with the mouse wheel and drag with the left mouse button to pan.

Tips:

  • Heavy units can not fire and move at the same time.
  • Kiting is a technique to make enemies follow you while you stay out of their attack range.
  • Snipers are the best against hard targets, but be sure to clear a path for them.

Made by Raeleus and Tommy Ettinger. 

Sounds effects by DragonQueen.

Music by Jake Stevens: https://www.youtube.com/user/jakery1295
